title: Vingegaard Vows to Keep Swinging at Imperious Pogačar: ‘We Will Fight To The End of The Tour de France’
content:
'I believed we could crack Tadej today': Few regrets for defending Dane and right-hand man Jorgenson after valiant team display on Sunday.

Read the full article at Vingegaard Vows to Keep Swinging at Imperious Pogačar: ‘We Will Fight To The End of The Tour de France’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
